    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>866</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Clay</string>
            <string language="es">Arcilla</string>
            <string language="ga">Cré</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Argile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Argila</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Argilla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αργιλος</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This quiz will test what you know about using clay in Art Class!</string>
            <string language="es">Este cuestionario comprobará tus conocimientos sobre el uso de arcilla en la clase de arte.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tástálfaidh an tráth na gceist seo an méid atá ar eolas agat faoi chré a úsáid sa Rang Ealaíne!</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Visual Arts</string>
            <string language="es">Artes visuales</string>
            <string language="ga">Amharcealaíona</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Quiz prüft, was Sie über das Verwenden 
des Lehms in der kunst-Kategorie kennen!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce jeu testera ce que vous connaissez utiliser 
l'argile dans la classe d'art !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este quiz testará o que você sabe sobre usar a 
argila na classe de arte!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo quiz esaminerà che cosa conoscete circa 
usando l'argilla nel codice categoria di arte!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο διαγωνισμός γνώσεων θα εξετάσει τι ξέρετε για
τη χρησιμοποίηση του αργίλου στην κλάση τέχνης!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtkünste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts Visuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes Visuais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti Visive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικαστηκές τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
